sentences.en: He learned this lesson the hard way from his own personal experience.
sentences.cn: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。

sentences.en: Her fate should be a salutary lesson (= one that teaches or warns you about something ).
sentences.cn: 她的命运应该是一个有益的教训。

sentences.en: His sailing instructor fell overboard and drowned during a lesson.
sentences.cn: 他的航海教练在一次训练课时从船上失足跌入水中，溺水身亡。

sentences.en: I've got a piano lesson later today.
sentences.cn: 今天晚些时候我有一堂钢琴课。

sentences.en: It was the quickest swimming lesson I'd ever witnessed.
sentences.cn: 这是我所见过的最速成的游泳课。

sentences.en: Now let that be a lesson to you all (= be careful to avoid having the same bad experience again ).
sentences.cn: 现在你们大家就从中吸取教训吧。

sentences.en: Our teacher is full of wit when he has a lesson.
sentences.cn: 我们的老师只要讲课就很风趣.

sentences.en: The boys argued over the thorny points in the lesson.
sentences.cn: 孩子们辩论功课中的难点.

sentences.en: The lesson from all of this is perhaps a broader one.
sentences.cn: 从所有这一切中得出的教训可能具有更广泛的意义。

sentences.en: There are a few trivial slips in this lesson.
sentences.cn: 在这篇课文中有几个小错误.

sentences.en: they were teaching me a lesson for daring to complain.
sentences.cn: 他们为我胆敢抱怨而给我颜色看。

sentences.en: This lesson adds to the value of the book.
sentences.cn: 这一课增加了这本书的价值.

sentences.en: This lesson is a continuation of our last lesson.
sentences.cn: 这课是上一课的延续部分.

sentences.en: Variety of methods helps to liven up a lesson.
sentences.cn: 教学方法多样化会使教学更加生动.

sentences.en: We went to the Biology class instead of attending the English lesson.
sentences.cn: 我们去上生物课而不去上英语课.

sentences.en: We were disappointed that they could not learn the lesson of history.
sentences.cn: 他们没能吸取历史的教训,使我们感到很失望.

sentences.en: You should teach him a lesson.

trans.tran_cn: 一课时，课程，教训，《圣经》选读
trans.tran_en: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car
